channel.title: CVE Feed for gVectors Team -- wpForo Forum (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for gVectors Team -- wpForo Forum (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-38144|2024-08-03T10:45:52.681Z -- gvectors%20team -- wpforo%20forum%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in gVectors Team wpForo Forum plugin <= 2.0.5 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-40192|2024-08-03T12:14:40.035Z -- gvectors%20team -- wpforo%20forum%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in wpForo Forum plugin <= 2.0.9 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-40200|2024-08-03T12:14:40.249Z -- gvectors%20team -- wpforo%20forum%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (subscriber+) Arbitrary File Upload vulnerability in wpForo Forum plugin <= 2.0.9 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-40205|2024-08-03T12:14:40.035Z -- gvectors%20team -- wpforo%20forum%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Insecure direct object references (IDOR) vulnerability in the wpForo Forum plugin <= 2.0.5 on WordPress allows attackers with subscriber or higher user roles to mark any forum post as solved/unsolved.

item.title: CVE-2022-40206|2024-08-03T12:14:39.658Z -- gvectors%20team -- wpforo%20forum%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Insecure direct object references (IDOR) vulnerability in the wpForo Forum plugin <= 2.0.5 on WordPress allows attackers with subscriber or higher user roles to mark any forum post as private/public.

item.title: CVE-2022-40632|2024-08-03T12:21:46.528Z -- gvectors%20team -- wpforo%20forum%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in gVectors Team wpForo Forum plugin <= 2.0.5 on WordPress leading to topic deletion.
